|brand = Buffalo |model = WZR-HP-G300NH |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/17/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Buffalo_WZR-HP-G300NH_v2.0 |wlclass = N300 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = FDI-09101896-0 |icid = 6102A-035 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7242;AR7242-AH1A, G12196.1C, 1025; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = 2 |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16C6-25C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8316;AR8316-AK1E, D1H1788, 1108; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:24:A5 |oui = 00:24:A5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.03;PB93; |stockos = Linux;2.6.39.4;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC or POE --> |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = XXXXXXXXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, LEDE Project, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2016 |fccapprovdate = 04/26/2011 |estreldate = 08/2011 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 747464118468 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0028ACYEK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9283;AR9283-AL1A, N4B274.00B, 1108; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WZR-HP-G302HV2", "21514W302HV21A1 Rev: A0-2", "03000611122010A" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device appears to be manufactured by Cameo.
The default SSID appears to be the wireless interface MAC address (no delimiters, upper case hex digits). The device probably uses AR9287 for the WiFi chip.
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-g300nh2 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *Revision A1A0 and WZR-HP-G302H A1A0 (Japanese variant) WZR-HP-G302H is Japanese market name for WZR-HP-G300NH2, and seems to have slightly different WiFi chip, [[Atheros]] AR9283-AL1A. "WZR-HP-G302HV2" and "21514W302HV21A2 Rev:A2" is silkscreened on the board. *Revision B0A0 (marketed as N300 HighPower Gigabit) [[Buffalo WZR-300HP|WZR-300HP]] This board, marked "WZR-HP-G302HV2 Rev:A3", is nearly identical to the other revisions, and the same image appears to flash successfully.
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.usbjtag.com/vbforum/showthread.php?t=8570 ''JTAG a Buffalo WZR-HP-G300NH2?'' on '''UsbJtag''' forums]
